Class ChannelLinkService

java.lang.Object
com.powerbi.api.service.ChannelLinkService
@Service public class ChannelLinkService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing ChannelLink entities. Handles CRUD operations and authorization checks for creating, updating, retrieving, and deleting channel links.

  • Method Details

    • getChannelLinks

      public List<ChannelLink> getChannelLinks(String username, Long channelId)
      Retrieves all ChannelLink entities associated with a given channel.
      Parameters:
      username - the user requesting the links
      channelId - the ID of the channel
      Returns:
      a list of ChannelLink entities
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException - if the user does not have permission to view links in the channel

    • getChannelLink

      public ChannelLink getChannelLink(String username, Long channelId, Long channelLinkId)
      Retrieves a ChannelLink based on the given username, channelId, and channelLinkId.

      This method checks if the channel is private and whether the user has the necessary permissions to access links within the channel. If the user does not have the required permissions, an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user attempting to access the channel link.
      channelId - The ID of the channel where the link is stored.
      channelLinkId - The ID of the channel link to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The ChannelLink associated with the given channelId and channelLinkId.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException - If the user does not have permission to access links in a private channel.
      NoSuchElementException - If no channel or channel link is found with the specified IDs.
      NullPointerException - If any of the required parameters (e.g., username, channelId, or channelLinkId) are null.

    • createChannelLink

      public ChannelLink createChannelLink(String username, ChannelLinkDTO channelLinkData)
      Creates a new ChannelLink entity and associates it with a channel and a link.
      Parameters:
      username - the user creating the channel link
      channelLinkData - the data for the new channel link
      Returns:
      the newly created ChannelLink entity
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException - if the user does not have permission to create links in the channel

    • updateChannelLink

      public ChannelLink updateChannelLink(String username, ChannelLinkDTO channelLinkData)
      Updates an existing ChannelLink entity.
      Parameters:
      username - the user updating the channel link
      channelLinkData - the new data for the channel link
      Returns:
      the updated ChannelLink entity
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException - if the user does not have permission to update the channel link

    • deleteChannelLink

      public void deleteChannelLink(String username, Long channelLinkId)
      Deletes an existing ChannelLink entity.
      Parameters:
      username - the user deleting the channel link
      channelLinkId - the ID of the channel link to delete
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException - if the user does not have permission to delete the channel link
